EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners / Kenneth Milstead (BioMimetic Therapeutics) (1343057786.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners / Kenneth Milstead (BioMimetic Therapeutics) (1343057786.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Dear Megan , On behalf of everyone here at MBO Partners, we look forward to working with your firm. MBO Partners caters to two markets. Our first service is designed for independent consultants and small businsses <http://www.mbopartners.com/#howwehelp> who choose to plug into our MBO Services Cloud to make it easier for them to work with their clients. We take care of all the back office administrative, HR, regulatory and financial issues so they can stay focused on delivering on their services. The second is how we help enterprise organizations engage more efficently and safely with their contract workforce <http://www.mboenterprise.com/how-we-help>. We have also put together a short one page collateral <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf> that explains how we work and the markets we serve. The following links provide our standard agreement <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_MSA_Template.pdf> and statement of work <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_SOW.pdf> we use when engaging our Associates with their clients. Please review and complete it, and return a signed copy to me. And, please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions. Thanks again, and I look forward to working with you. Best regards,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Kenneth Milstead [mailto:milstead@medelle.com] Sent: Saturday, July 21, 2012 4:32 PM To: Sara Conde; Megan Lisiecki Subject: MBO Partners / Kenneth Milstead (BioMimetic Therapeutics) Sara and Megan, This is just a quick note to introduce you to each other. Megan, Sara is the person who will be dealing with contract and billing issues for MBO Partners. Sara, Megan is an executive recruiter who will be dealing with contract issues. You will also need to have contact with the client (BioMimetic Therapeutics). Megan will provide their contact info and make the appropriate introductions. I know that you both have my contact info, but I'll include it here as well for easy reference. Sara, we need to have this contract written by Wednesday or Thursday so that it can be reviewed by the BioMimetic Therapeutics contracts committee on Friday (July 27). Megan can provide more information on this process and on deadlines. Assuming the committee is in agreement, we hope that I can begin working with the client on Monday, July 30. I look forward to talking with both of you during the week Thanks,Ken Sara CondeConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partnerst: 703-793-6028f: 703.793.6081e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC0yOTcmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTI5NyZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzMzQ4ODg2OTgmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjQ4OTI2MDImZW1haWxpZD1taWxzdGVhZEBtZWRlbGxlLmNvbSZ1c2VyaWQ9bC0xMjgtMjAwMjYtMTEwMTkwMi0xJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRons67JZKXonjHpfsX56uwsUKe0lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ATsFrI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D>Megan LisieckiPresident & CEOKingston ONeill SearchT: 919.346.1264 x227 F: 877.876.9496C: 919.559.3815E: Megan Lisiecki <megan@kingstononeill.com <mailto:megan@kingstononeill.com>> Kenneth Milstead 2814 Sundorn Street # 4 Jefferson, LA 70121 T: 504-324-4861 C: 504-931-9117 E: krmilstead@yahoo.com <mailto:krmilstead@yahoo.com> </body
